Last modified: Wed Mar 30 11:24:11 NZST 2016

puSpagRha pu'Spa--gRha

n. ` flower-house ' , a conservatory R. MW081382 639,2 L=127005

pUSan pUSa'n

pra pra'

pra pra'

ind. forward , in front , on , forth (mostly in connection with a verb , esp. with a verb of motion which is often to be supplied ; sometimes repeated before the verb cf. Pāṇ. 8-1 , 6 ; rarely as a separate word e.g. AitBr. ii , 40) _ 652,2 L=129752.1

pra pra'

ind. as a prefix to subst. = forth , away cf. pra-vRtti , pra-sthAna _ 652,2 L=129752.2

pra pra'

pra pra'

ind. in nouns of relationship = great- cf. pra-pitAmaha , pra-pautra _ 652,2 L=129752.4

pra pra'

prakRti pra-kRti

f. (in the SAMkhya phil.) the original producer of (or rather passive power of creating) the material world (consisting of 3 constituent essences or GuNas called sattva , rajas and tamas) , Nature (distinguished from puruSa , Spirit as MAyA is distinguished from Brahman in the Veda^ntas) 654,1 L=130029
